name: Jib's Evolution
description:
This game was made at the 2018 Summer Game Jam at New England Institute of Technology.

Theme: Charles Darwin

Time: 24 Hours

Date: August 10 - 11  (2018)

Description: 2D Platformer were you control an animal forced to evolve or suffer extinction.  You must run, jump and fight your way through the island to survive.  Puzzles and obstacles will also need to be solved to succeed.

GitHub: https://github.com/JasonSkillman/Jib-s-Evolution

###Credits### 

Programmers:

Jason Skillman, Vincent Kyne

Designers: 

Amanda Coler, Bella Weikman
